snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic rallied from a 3-0 deficit in the final set to a 6-4, 2-6, 6-3 victory over David Goffin.
abstract: Novak Djokovic beats David Goffin and Serena Williams beats Karin Knapp in singles action at Western & Southern Open tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic rallied from a 3-0 deficit in the final set to a 6-4, 2-6, 6-3 victory over David Goffin.

headline.main: Djokovic and Williams Win in Ohio
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Djokovic and Williams Win in Ohio
